summary: This is a Simple Retexture of Clavicus Vile Mask.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Clavicus Vile Mask Gold Retexture
Version: 1.0
Date: 1/2/2013
Category: Models and Textures
Author: Goanfrimon


Description
===========
This is a Simple Retexture of Clavicus Vile Mask.

Install
=======
1. Extract the file to the Data folder.

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the files in the textures\clothes\clavicusvilemask

data\textures\clothes\clavicusvilemask\clavicus_vile_mask_d.dds
data\textures\clothes\clavicusvilemask\clavicus_vile_mask_m.dds
data\textures\clothes\clavicusvilemask\clavicus_vile_mask_n.dds

Incompatibility
===============
This mod is incompatible with any other mod that changes the texture of Clavicus Vile's Masque.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None.
If the texture isn't working for you, you've extracted it to the wrong place.

History
=======
1.0, 1/2/2013 - Initial release.

Contact
=======
Goanfrimon at the nexus

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Photoshop - http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop.html
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp


English is not my native language so sorry for my mistakes.
author: Goanfrimon
